attributes.action: people that work should get some sort of benefits  they pay enough taxes for it.
attributes.additional_details:
I think everybody that works should be entitled to some benefits ie: prescriptions etc .
There are people like myself that work or have worked most of their life and cant even afford to have a night out or even afford a luxury due to the fact of once you get paid all your money is paid out on bills and your left with nothing...
We pay enough taxes its about time we got something in return...
